column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1fc57d568b704f929890363a99d2a793956a15fe for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Shouldn't we get the initial value after connecting the signal handler, to avoid a race (we get, value changes, we hook signal)\n
I'm not sure if I see the problem here, how the current ordering could cause an issue? Can you explain a little more please.\n
